title: Problem with displaying bold text within the WordPress editor
content:
Good evening, I have a problem with the display of bold text on the Wordpress site editor.

I have already contacted the Wordpress experts and we have noticed that the problem does not exist with other browsers and does not depend on the brand of the PC, given that we have tried with different PCs and with different operating systems (Mac and Windows).

The problem really comes from the browser.

How can I solve it?
creator: donnavagabonda

title: Get Messages "Get Mail" missing down menu for indivual account checks
content:
Have five email accounts, only 2 are set to check mail at startup. A change has taken the ability to click the down menu in the Get Messages icon to show all the accounts for a individual account check. With this change , if its intentional, it allows no obvious method to check these seldom used accounts. Checked the customization for the old "Get Message" with the down menu so I can return this feature and its not shown as a choice. If this is the intent then the "Account Settings" "Server Settings" to "Check for new messages at start up" which can be either checked or unchecked needs some attention. The missing down menu allowed these unchecked accounts to be checked only by selecting this down menu allowed clicking any of my 5 accounts account, and if memory is correct a choice to check all accounts.

If this is intentional change, how do I check individual accounts that are unchecked as still allowed in the settings.

Should this "Get Messages" with the down menu feature be returned or the "Account Setting / Server Settings" be changed to not allow a choice but require all accounts to be checked at start up, after a period of time, or by clicking "Get Messages" again to get newer messages all the time rather then by choice.

I'm requesting it be returned as a choice in the Customization items as I see no way to now check them with my current Account / Server settings.
creator: patcoghm

title: don't want to save file to open it
content: open a file, it is saved. save file, it is saved. what's different? My downloads folder is so fucking dirty. Developer, are you kidding me?
creator: fly2bluec

title: Importing bookmarks from Safari
content:
Instructions to import bookmarks from Safari are awful.

None of them are up to date, referring to "preferences" when Safari now uses "settings."

Second, all questions and answers are UNDATED, which means "help" is close to useless. I don't want to read a help suggestion from 2012 - and I have seen them pop up when I ask a question.

I'm wanting to use Firefox to support alternatives to Google and Apple, but so far the transition is a slog.

Thanks for some up-to-date instructions which the poster has actually tested!

Chalmers
creator: chop1

title: YouTube will not load, but only in Firefox.
content: YouTube will no longer load, but only in Firefox. It works in every other browser I have. If I have a DIRECT link to a video page the video itself will load, but nothing else does. I have attached screenshots of the YouTube homepage not loading, the video page failing to load, and then it successfully loading in other browsers. I also attached a screenshot of my plugins. I have no extensions installed for Firefox. My browser has no updates available either it says, and my cookies have already been cleared. Still will not load.
creator: jacobjimmy2000

title: Video freeze during fullscreen when the playback control-bar auto-hides
content:
Hi,

When I play a video from for example imdb.com, and switch to full-screen, the video picture freezes at the moment the playback control-bar automatically hides. The audio continues to play. The video picture will resume playing the moment the playback control-bar is shown again (when moving the mouse), but freezes again when the control-bar hides again.

I'm using Firefox version 119.0 (64-bit). The problem just started out of the blue, and I never had issues with video playback before. I've seen this on various sites, but strangely not on youtube. I've tried disabling all addons, but no effect.

Does anyone have an idea what's going on and how I can fix it?
creator: erwin_school

title: Problems with YouTube
content:
Hi,

I have a problem with youTube. I've always been able to access my channel sections simply by clicking on the section title with no issues. However, since last night, that is not working. Now, the only way I can see all the playlists in each section is if I right-click and open in a new tab.

Any ideas what's up? As far as I'm aware, it's not a connection problem and I've cleared the cache etc. Using a Mac.

It's a real pain having to open sections in a whole load of different tabs. Any pointers in the right direction would be much appreciated! Also, I'm not very tech-savvy :(

Many thanks, Maroulita
creator: Maroulita

title: Shortcuts to search engines on New Tab?
content:
The New Tab page includes some shortcuts by default, including Amazon Search (see "@amazon" in the attached picture), which I dismissed shortly after installation. (The only options are "Pin/Unpin" and "Dismiss".)

However, I want to create such shortcut for another search engine, like https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s&iax=images&ia=images and I don't see the option - even if I set the URL to include "%s" and the name of the pinned shortcut begins with "@", as with smart keyword search and the Amazon search shortcut, respectively.

I am an advanced user and don't mind manually editing files in my profile folder (after I back it up of course).
creator: vaclavtrpisovsky

title: Firefox 115.3.1esr @ Rocky Linux - otevírané soubory se vždy ukládají, nesmažou se jako dočasné
content: Zdravím! V ESR verzi Firefoxu na Rocky Linuxu 8.3 se mi stažený soubor (např. PDF) vždy trvale uloží do adresáře bez ohledu na nastavení jiného způsobu zacházení se souborem, než je uložení (vždy se zeptat / otevřít ve FF / otevřít v systémovém PDF prohlížeči). Jakmile se soubor otevře v označené aplikaci, současně se trvale ukládá. To je velmi otravné, nechtěně uložené soubory musím dohledávat a pracně mazat. ?? Díky / Tommy
